SELECT B.* FROM (SELECT A.* , rownum as rnum FROM (SELECT row_number()OVER(ORDER BY seq ASC) as rown ,seq, model_code, model_name, filename, to_char(write_date , 'YYYY-MM-DD') as write_date, make_comp, state_chk FROM phonemodel) A ) B
WHERE #startNum# <= rnum AND rnum <= #endNum#
ORDER BY rown DESC
